content: baby feet are one of the cutest things but sometimes they need to be covered up whether it s fashion you re looking for keeping those tootsies warm or just because these booties are quick to work up and a perfect stash buster find it free here 1 difficulty intermediate sizes included baby 0-6 months 6-12 months all patterns are written in english and use standard american english crochet terms permission to sell finished products but not the pattern itself all patterns have been tested by qualified crochet artists but if you believe there may be an error please contact me i fully support all my patterns and will offer any additional assistance so you may complete the pattern successfully please refer to difficulty level within the listings sign up for crystalized designs newsletters and get the latest releases sales and more http //madmimi com/signups/129011/join find me on facebook http //www facebook com/crystalizeddesignsforyou i would love to see any pictures feel free to post on my wall 1 http //www crystalized-designs com/blog/ridged-baby-booties/
